long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabjay helps gather and share information so you always have exactly what is needed for the task at hand.

The Tabjay Chrome extension sends important links to tasks from any webpage. It also allows Tabjay to include your open browser tabs when adding links from within a task.
